title: Easily one of the most frightening movies ever made.
review: The Blair Witch Project is easily one of the most frightening movies ever made. It plays with your head in more ways than you can count. A movie that taps in to what *really* frightens us, as humans.  Most people are frightened of just being lost in the woods, and everyone is scared of being lost with something *else* in the woods.  It'll make you small.Filmmaking history, mark my words.
